name: Kpop Instant Game
description:
All Kpop lover should like this game :)

Rounds by round, games by games, just open the app and you can play instanly :)

As the game about Kpop, you will challenge with awesome Kpop song, greatest band and most popular idols!

Here are the games in this game:

*** The Voice: Pick the correct one who singing

*** Follow Me: Tap in order those idols appeared

*** Catch The Idol: Images of idols are moving around. Catch the one who is called

*** Hyungim and Maknae: Drag correct age comparison

*** Name The Band: Tap to write the name of the band

*** The song: Guess which song is playing

*** Step Back: Tap in opposite order those idols appeared

*** Something Wrong: There's a wrong name here

*** Flip Memory: Pair up the same idol

*** Outside Man: Tap who not belong to the band

*** Popular One: Tap the idol who appear most

*** Name Tag: Drag the name to the correct idol
